snippet: Health officials say the disease was spread by unvaccinated staff members at the facility in Eloy, Ariz....
abstract: Arizona Dept of Health Services pressures Immigration and Customs Enforcement for greater cooperation in identifying which of their employees has had measles vaccinations, following outbreak at detention facility that has affected 22 people, including nine employees; Corrections Corporation of America, private prison company that runs facility, has already complied with Arizona's request.
lead_paragraph: Health officials say the disease was spread by unvaccinated staff members at the facility in Eloy, Ariz.

headline.main: Immigration Detention Center in Arizona Failed to Contain Measles Outbreak
headline.print_headline: Immigration Center Failed to Contain Measles Outbreak
